ReviewList.Text: Good book for beginners to science. The math equations are explained well. There are a lot of examples to confirm what you learn.  Great illustrations for driving home the concepts learned. If you ate a visual learner, this book is great.

Condition said "good" and definitely should have been "acceptable" which I likely wouldn't have bought. Cover, spine, and pages were all pretty worn and there is a decent amount of highlighting and marking in it though all of the text is still legible. Only reason I didn't do two stars is because I only paid $23 for it, though it is 3 years old and some of the material is outdated. No idea why my teacher had us get an old book. The main problem I have with the book however is that 8 pages in the middle of the book just started falling out when I got to it and the binding is noticeably messed up there. I take good care of my books too as well the fact that I hardly opened the thing until midterms so I'm pretty positive the binding and pages were on the brink before I got it. I understand they were still attached when it was sold to me but I looked up the condition descriptions for books and even before the pages fell out the book falls under "acceptable" considering the wear and amount of highlighting. I am pretty late getting to this review and I have filled all of my science requirements now so I won't need another textbook but the point I want to make is Mr. Tillery please be more thoughtful and/or honest with your condition ratings. I would assume you don't heavily rely on selling $23 used textbooks for income so please be more careful with it. For what I did read of it I thought was well written and engaging for science being my least favorite subject but I don't like buying really worn down books so Mr. Tillery expend a little more energy and do more work on your objects by looking through them harder before you sell them.

Although I believe this text is too advanced for mid-tier sections of 9th grade physical science, it is perfect for honors sections, or for more advanced students of other sciences to use for a review.  It has just about everything covered, is well written, and is laid out in a readable manner, with just enough illustrations to support learning, but not so much as to be too busy.

Required for coursework in Physical Science with lab. Book is well organized, full of great information and pictures. End of chapter self-tests, questions for thoughtful response. Summarizes calculations explained in text.
Be aware that this is not compatible with a Kindle!  Only works on an iPad or my MacBook. I was unaware os it is very inconvenient that I cannot bring it on my Kindle to class, as I intended.
With the price of school books today, I was happy to find this on amazon. Though a bit worn, it serves the purpose. Excellent buy.
They did not send me the book they showed. I think the one  they sent me is the older version because the cover is different
of great help same material even though it is a different edition i got an A in my physics class thanks to this book ;-*
A great textbook for a student has already taken a basic Physics and/or Chemistry class.  Easy to read and understand.
Usually when it comes to physical science I am lost, but this book described everything very well. very good book.
It was as described and arrived in time. The book itself is pretty good, easy to read and has great exercises.
It is a great source for helping me with my course work for college.  It will be helpful in the future.
This book was a basic science book. I hardly had to use it so I didn't get much from it.
Not as described!  Terrible shape.  Should have been listed as "FAIR CONDITION"
This book was delivered to me exactly as described.  Thank you.
Just as described thanks

I took physical geography last semester and now I'm taking this. I wish I still had last semester's book. I have a suspicion that they were both written by the same people. The material appears to be identical. The book does the job, but it's not cheap considering it's just a repeat of my last class.
Received text quickly. Book is in good condition. Only con is the end of chapter reviews were completed in ink. Would have been better if written in pencil so I could erase the answers.
This Book was in really good condition it had some writing but not a big deal. It has no liquid spills. And the pages/ conver was intact!!! I Am really happy with my book!!
Everything worked out great.  I love the idea of getting discounted books for college.  The quality of the item was good and it arrived in a timely manner.  Thanks!
When I ordered this it was suppose to be the text book not the work book so I wasted my money on something I couldn't and didn't use.
The book came quickly and at a great price so very pleased since I don't really wanna take this class but its on my degree plan:(!!!
This book was in great condition and was a great price but for the class that I bought it for I never ended up using it.
Yay
